mapper.select: SELECT P.project_no AS projectNo , P.title AS title , P.start_at AS startAt , P.deadline AS deadline , UP.lock FROM `project` P JOIN `user_project` UP ON P.project_no = UP.project_no WHERE UP.user_no = #{userNo}
SELECT U.profile_pic AS pic , U.user_no AS userNo FROM user U JOIN user_project UP ON U.user_no = UP.user_no WHERE UP.project_no = #{projectNo} AND UP.LOCK = 0
